title: British scrapbook. Parts 1 and 2
creator_credit: Directorate of Army Kinematography (The War Office)
brief_description: A scrapbook look at World War II using some captured enemy film, but mostly film shot by the military cameramen of the forces of the United Nations. Part one: June 1940-October 1942; Part two: November 1942-December 1944.
description: A scrapbook look at World War II using some captured enemy film, but mostly film shot by the military cameramen of the forces of the United Nations. Part one: June 1940-October 1942; Part two: November 1942-December 1944.
